riwirasa dewana adiyaredi 1996 ape්ral 19 wana dina thennamarachchi pa්radeshaya athpath kara ganima aramuna wiya. 1996 mayi 02 da wana wita thennamarachchi pa්radeshaya mudagath pasu riwirasa meheyume thunwana ha awasana adiyara 1996 mayi 15 wana dina diyath kerini. 1996 mayi 25 dina wana wita peduru thuduwa, walwatithure, nelli adi pa්radesha athulu wadamarachchi pa්radeshaya hamudawa mudawa ganu labina.
